p: NA has been regarded as one of the most important target of the anti-influenza virus activity of the drugs. As shown in Table 2 , peramivir presented dose-dependent NA inhibitory activity with IC 50 value of 0.69 ± 0.05 mg/mL. But no apparent inhibition effect of epiprogoitrin, progoitrin, epigoitrin or goitrin on NA was observed, even at the highest concentration (5 mg/mL).
